--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:

> "I see," before she can say any more, she received a transmission 
from 
> Hydras:
> 
> > After that Hydras send an encoded message to Maxima.
> > 
> > "Maxima,
> > If you're inside Maximal's base you have to wait a while before 
do 
> > your mission. If you're now out or around, move quickly far of 
it. A 
> > cloud is around the base but it's the Plague. Be careful. As soon 
as 
> > you're far of Maximal Base's area  go to this area (gives a 
> > coordinates) and call me when you arrive there. Good luck.
> > 
> > Hydras"
> > 
> 
> This slightly stunned her of his concern. But she quickly pushed it 
aside as 
> she got up in beast mode & twisted around to see something that was 
> surrounding the nearby  base. 
> 
> "Might I suggest that we leave this area.... immediately, Empath!"  
> 
> Then she glanced off in the direction of where the Ark may be. "I 
know a 
> place where we can go." taking a couple steps. "Coming?"
> 
> "Otherwise,... if you stay, it will possibly be your doom." she 
thought about 
> it... she just rescued Empath, in which Hydras wanted her dead... 
but... 
> perhaps it was too soon to finish her off... she would still be 
needed... she 
> was a Decepticon.

"I haven't much choice for the moment," Empath says, following 
Maxima.  "But don't expect me to get drawn into a Predacon trap.  The 
instant I sense Hydras or any of his minions coming, I'm gone."
